alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Griggs; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grand Forks, northwestern Traill, southeastern Griggs and Steele Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1051 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Golden Lake, or 38 miles southwest of Grand Forks, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hatton and Portland around 1110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holmes and Reynolds. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 117 and 126. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
